_description: Type effectiveness matrix for monster combat. Based on Pokemon-style type mechanics.

type_descriptions.normal: Balanced type with no particular strengths or weaknesses. Reliable and versatile.
type_descriptions.fire: Hot and fierce. Burns grass and ice, but struggles against water and ground.
type_descriptions.water: Flowing and adaptable. Douses fire and erodes ground, but weak to electricity.
type_descriptions.grass: Natural and resilient. Absorbs water and breaks ground, but vulnerable to many types.
type_descriptions.electric: Shocking and fast. Electrifies water and flying foes, but grounded by earth.
type_descriptions.ice: Cold and brittle. Freezes grass, ground, and flying types, but melts easily.
type_descriptions.fighting: Physical and strong. Overpowers normal and dark types, but struggles with agile foes.
type_descriptions.poison: Toxic and debilitating. Poisons grass types, but less effective against other toxins.
type_descriptions.ground: Solid and heavy. Buries fire, electric, and poison, but washed away by water.
type_descriptions.flying: Airborne and swift. Swoops down on grass and fighting types, but vulnerable to electricity.
type_descriptions.psychic: Mental and mysterious. Dominates fighting and poison types, but countered by darkness.
type_descriptions.dark: Shadowy and cunning. Preys on psychic types, but vulnerable to fighting spirit.
